title: The Entrepreneur’s Power: A practical guide to get energy for yourself and motivate others. Proven tips to unleash your full potential.
description: Starting a business puts you in the front seat. You’re the boss now and this idea you have is a brainchild sitting in the backseat.So how do you get that car rolling and keep it going?Being an entrepreneur requires a healthy dose of continual motivation. Once you realize how to find motivation and make sure it doesn’t leave you, you’ll be well on the way to your destination, brainchild safely strapped in.This book helps You have an idea and a why.Only you can do justice to that why. By building the best possible foundation for your idea, you can set yourself up for success in what feels like an over-saturated market of entrepreneurship.A short read packed with advice, The Entrepreneur’s Power will help make your entrepreneurial journey one to be proud of.
author: Matt Poyle
